section.title: Items Without Item Sources
section.para: To identify Items without Item Sources, select the "Items Without Item Sources" option. The following screen will appear:
When identifying Items without Item Sources, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Display lists all Items without Item Sources.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
